title: Premiere: Sara Hartman – Two Feet Off The Ground
body:
It’s been a hectic month for Sara Hartman.

Fresh from opening for Ellie Goulding on her Delirium World Tour, she’s set to hit SXSW next week before supporting X Ambassadors in May. With her debut track, Monster Lead Me Home, clocking up an impressive ten million streams on Spotify, and her delightful cover of Jamie XX’s Stranger in a Room impressing tastemakers round the globe, her next move comes eagerly anticipated.

_Two Feet Off The Ground_, her newest offering, is another slice of perfect written pop; uplifting verses, and a huge radio ready chorus – it’s fair to say that 2016 is shaping up rather nicely for Sara Hartman. Check out Two Feet Off The Ground below, alongside her forthcoming tour dates.

March 16th – Communion @ Black Heart – SXSW

March 17th – Disco Naivete @ The Sidewinder Outside – SXSW

March 19th  – Stubb’s – SXSW

March 17 – Scott In – Austin, TX, US

May 03 – Town Ballroom – Buffalo, NY, US

May 04 – The Fillmore – Detroit, MI, US

May 08 – House Of Blues – Boston, MA, US

May 12 – Echostage – Washington, DC, US

May 13 – Terminal 5 – New York, NY

June 03 – Maifield Derby Festival – Mannheim, GER

June 10 – PULS Open Air 2016 – Geltendorf, GER

August 11 – Haldern Pop Festival 2016 – Haldern, GER

August 19 – MS Dockville Festival 2016 – Hamburg, GER
